settings.io_hidden_text: An introduction into our world and what goes into your products

settings.ic_text:
We started making tailored lingerie from our kitchen table
Selling locally through Facebook.

We opened our first workspace just outside of town.
And employed our first assistant growing our humble team to 3

We open our first website using the Vantage theme on Shopify.
Little did we know what was about to unfold...

We surpassed our first million in sales
during the valentines day build up
This is just the beginning...

settings.io_hidden_text: Common requests, what if's and how do I's...

settings.ac_content_1: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.
settings.ac_heading_2: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.ac_content_2: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.
settings.ac_heading_3: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.ac_content_3: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.
settings.ac_content_4: We always aim for make sure our customers love our products, but if you do need to return an order, we’re happy to help. Just email us directly and we’ll take you through the process.
settings.ac_heading_5: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.ac_content_5: It depends on the creator and the product. All options are outlined on the product page, so look out for customization options there.
settings.ac_heading_6: Can I sign up to your newsletter?
settings.ac_content_6: Yes! Just enter your email here, and you’ll be added to our subscription list. You’ll be sent updates, exclusive offers, and much more.
settings.ac_content_7: No. This is demonstration content, designed to showcase how these page could look with your own content.

settings.io_hidden_text: Introducing the all new drone

settings.io_heading: See life from a different perspective
settings.io_hidden_text: Introducing the Karma Quadcopter

settings.ac_content_1: Take aerial shots with this GoPro Karma drone. Its Karma Stabilizer lets the included HERO5 Black action camera capture shake-free videos, while the Karma Grip provides reliable stabilization for handheld and mounted filming. The game-style controller with an integrated touch display makes Karma easy and fun to fly.

6 propellers
Battery and charger
Case and mounting ring
Controller with touch display
GoPro HERO5 BLACK
Grip handle
Harness and frame (for HERO5 Black)
Karma Drone
Stabilizer
USB-C cable
settings.ac_content_3: Free returns available for all products. Items must be in original unused condition with packaging unopened.

settings.ic_title: A real looker from every angle
settings.ic_text: An elegant finished metal rod dining chair with wool boucle cushion. A quality chair which can be used for dining or occasional seating.

settings.ac_heading_1: How long does an order take to ship?
settings.ac_content_1: Typically shipping and handling times will be stated in the product description. Please visit our SHIPPING & RETURNS page for more information.
settings.ac_content_2: Yes! If you would like a detailed shipping quote for your location contact us.

settings.io_hidden_text: We guarantee you will love it!
How Can We Help You?
We offer a no interest payment plan as well as take all major credit cards.

settings.txt_title: Open a personal Haus Credit Card today and enjoy
settings.txt_text_1: $40 off your first order of $250 or more
settings.txt_text_2: 3% back in rewards on qualifying orders
settings.txt_text_3: $0 down and up to 36-month financing on eligible orders
settings.txt_text_4: That's right no annual fee to worry about.

settings.ac_heading_1: Is there special financing on the Haus card?
settings.ac_content_1:
Yes! We're excited to offer several financing options.

6-month special financing on orders over $250

12-month special financing on orders over $500

18-month special financing on orders over $1,500
settings.ac_heading_2: How will I receive my Haus card?
settings.ac_content_2: Applying online is fast and easy. If approved, we'll automatically add your new personal Haus Card to checkout so that you can use it today. You will receive your card within 10 days via US mail.
settings.ac_content_3: Every time you make an eligible purchase on your personal Haus Card at one of our retail sites, you'll earn 3% back in Rewards that you can redeem on a future order.

settings.io_hidden_text: We put care into every package and order we ship!

settings.ac_content_1: We've carefully selected the shipping options for each product on our site to ensure you receive the fastest, safest, and most reliable delivery service possible. Each item's delivery options will be noted on its product page, as well as in the shopping cart.
settings.ac_heading_2: Any Exceptions I Should Be Aware Of?
settings.ac_content_2: Deliveries are not typically made on Saturdays or Sundays. We cannot ship to P.O. Boxes or Military APOs. If you live in a non-contiguous U.S. state or territory—in Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, or the U.S. Virgin Islands—additional fees or shipping restrictions may apply.
settings.ac_heading_3: How does the shipping process work?
settings.ac_content_3:
Step 1: Choose a delivery option for your Large Parcel item at checkout. Available delivery methods vary by item; all options will be displayed in the shopping cart.

Step 2: Your order gets picked up from the warehouse. We'll send you a Ship Confirmation email to let you know your order is on its way.

Step 3: Your order is shipped to a Local Delivery Terminal. A Large Parcel carrier transports your order with care to a delivery professional in your area.

Step 4: Schedule a delivery appointment. Upon arrival of your order, the local terminal will contact you to schedule a delivery date and appointment window.

Step 5: Welcome your new order home! Be sure to inspect the shipment contents upon delivery. If you have any concerns regarding the condition or packaging of your order, simply describe the issue on the delivery receipt provided by the driver and contact us for assistance.

settings.io_hidden_text: If you're not happy with your order, we will do whatever we can.
Our phone support is available Monday - Friday 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. MST, or email us anytime!
New items seating, outdoor, tables and more added daily, for all your decor needs!
Feed your designer soul, with interior design-spiration.

settings.ic_text: The recipe for an inviting vintage boho bedroom is a warm neutrals and rough textures. Pair these textures with smooth pots and accessories for a stunning bohemian design that is sure to help you rest and renew.
Blend elements from different decorating styles to reflect your whole family tastes and personality, while maintaining sophistication and overall cohesion.
Create a workspace where you can combat writers block and conquer the world. Warm inviting colors, and a mixture of textures, make this workspace a haven.

settings.io_hidden_text: A highly configurable theme designed to put content first, creating better user experiences and more conversions.

settings.ic_text: Top-level collection pages are just regular old collections in Shopify, but now with new custom templates in the Vantage theme you can create collections that serve as larger top-level collections. This makes it easier for your customers to find products and keeps your large collections organized.
Advanced Layout Product pages allow you to make the product pages for a few of your best selling products more detailed, organized, and valuable.
Advanced Layout Pages allow you to make basic pages have more detail, and organization by using similar homepage section layouts as blocks on your pages.
